    Methods in com.openclassrooms.tourguide.service with parameters of type User
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    TourGuideService.addUser(User user)
    A POST method that returns a User passed in parameter and put into the internalUserMap declared below, if and only if the internalUserMap doesn't contain it.
    void
    RewardsService.calculateRewards(User user)
    A method that adds reward to a User passed in parameter for each attraction he has done in locations he has visited around his current location.
    List<tripPricer.Provider>
    TourGuideService.getTripDeals(User user)
    A GET method that returns a Provider list of provides offering trip deals based on the number of reward points the User passed in parameter has accumulated.
    gpsUtil.location.VisitedLocation
    TourGuideService.getUserLocation(User user)
    A GET method that returns the VisitedLocation for the User passed as a parameter after, if he has already visited some locations.
    List<UserReward>
    TourGuideService.getUserRewards(User user)
    A GET method that returns a UserReward list for the User passed as a parameter after calling the UserReward getter of User class.
    gpsUtil.location.VisitedLocation
    TourGuideService.trackUserLocation(User user)
    A method that gets the current location of an User passed as parameter, then add it to a list of visited locations and update the reward score.
